he Bloodstone Mines were a mine located within the Valley of Bloodstone.
The mine was a large mining complex. Its tunnels were usually  in height and  tall. The tunnels of the upper parts of the mine were worn with age and often covered in a layer of dust. The tunnels found in the lower parts of the mine better maintained. Meandering irregular circular tunnels with smooth walls were found here.
The mine was located in the eastern part of Bloodstone Pass. Its three entrances were found within a high canyon.
